p: The infectious titres of viral stocks for Ap7M and Ap7M-derived re-encoded strains were established in BHK21 cells, using a TCID 50 assay (results detailed in Table 2). For the majority of re-encoded viruses, no notable difference was observed with the parent strain Ap7M (9×10 8 TCID50/mL), with infectious titres ranging from 4×10 8 to 6×10 8 TCID50/mL. However, viruses YFV rNh and rTCGh showed a one- to two-log reduction in viral titre (6×10 6 and 6×10 7 TCID50/mL, respectively).
